name: Lastcrifices
description:
It’s war against Aliens. Sadly your ship is empty of ammo. You only have an experimental bomb on your board. Only a few soldiers remain to complete this suicide mission to destroy the Mothership. The last hope for humanity is your sacrifices.

Try to evade all defences and take your ship to the Core.

Even if you can't reach the core, your sacrifice can help clear the way for the next pilot!

Good Luck !!
